### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining drill at position (41, -82)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 41, -82) 
-  Wooden chest (position 40.5, -83.5) 
-  Wooden chest (position 41.5, -83.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position 39.5, -81.5)

### Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position 0, 0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into full inventories
-  Check the inventory of the entity before attempting to insert items
-  Ensure there is enough space in the inventory to insert the items

### Errors when extracting items from empty chests
-  Check the chest inventory before attempting to extract items
-  Ensure the chest is not empty before extracting items

### Errors when mining with a full destination chest
-  Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining
-  Ensure the destination chest has enough space to hold the mined resources

### NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
